name: Drunk-Fu: Wasted Masters
description:
Drunk-Fu: Wasted Masters is all about gravity defying ragdoll kung fu with hilarious customizable characters, weapons and a variety of levels & game modes

Team up with your friends to beat AI controlled bullies in the Swarm-mode or challenge each other in Endless, Ringout or Last Man Standing modes to see who is the true Wasted Master.Features:
  • Up to 8 players locally & online - including AI
  • Multiple game modes such as: Swarm, Ring out & Last Man Standing
  • 7 levels to choose from: Irish pub, Kuja, Tikibar, Saloon, Diner, Chimney, Midsummer
  • Melee weapons for bashing other around
  • Customizable characters to show the world your impeccable taste
